text: The Smiling Lieutenant is a 1931 American musical comedy movie directed by Ernst Lubitsch and was based on the 1905 novel Nux, der Prinzgemahl by Hans MÃ¼ller-Einigen and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1932. Actors include Maurice Chevalier, Claudette Colbert, Miriam Hopkins, Charles Ruggles, George Barbier, Hugh O'Connell and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1931 musical movies Category:1931 comedy movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Ernst Lubitsch Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Europe Category:Movies set in Vienna
title: The Smiling Lieutenant
